remarks: Membership is inherited by successors.  The reverse direction holds for all ordinals, as seen at ~ onsucsssucr , but the forward direction, for all ordinals, implies excluded middle as seen as ~ onsucsssucexmid . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 25-Aug-2019.)
statement: nnsucsssuc $p |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) -> ( A C_ B <-> suc A C_ suc B ) ) $.
